snippet: Juan Pierre beat out a run-scoring infield single in the 11th inning, lifting the Philadelphia Phillies to an 8-7 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Philadelphia Phillies earn an 8-7 victory over the St Louis Cardinals; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Juan Pierre beat out a run-scoring infield single in the 11th inning, lifting the Philadelphia Phillies to an 8-7 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals.

headline.seo: Pierre Lifts Phillies Over Cardinals in 11th Inning
headline.main: Just Ahead of Throw, Pierre Lifts Phillies Past Cardinals in the 11th
headline.print_headline: Just Ahead of Throw, Pierre Lifts Phillies Past Cardinals in the 11th
